paramecia.ability: Allows the user to make their body incredibly slippery, causing attacks to slide off harmlessly.

Allows the user to replicate parts of their body (including limbs, eyes, and ears) on any surface, including other people or objects, essentially granting them near-limitless spatial awareness and combat versatility.
Allows the user to make any part of their body explode, whether it be their limbs, hair, mucus, even breath or cough.
Allows the user to change their weight from 1 to 10,000 kilograms without, in any way, affecting the overall size of their body.
Allows the user to generate and manipulate wax at will. The wax can be molded into various shapes and used for offense, defense, or utility purposes.
Allows the user to eat and assimilate virtually any object, incorporating its properties into their own body. This includes both inorganic materials and other Devil Fruits.
Allows the user to replicate the appearance and voice of anyone they touch, creating perfect copies. This ability extends to animals and inanimate objects as well.
Allows the user to transform their body into blades, granting them the ability to slice through virtually anything with ease. It also enhances the user's physical strength and durability.
Allows the user to grow spikes on any part of their body, and turn any body part entirely into a spike.
Allows the user to bind their foes in iron shackles created by the user's body.
Allows the user to transform into a springs, gaining enhanced agility, jumping ability, and the ability to stretch their limbs like springs.
Allows the user to create and manipulate strings at will. These strings are incredibly strong and can be used for offense, defense, and controlling others like puppets.
Allows the user to emit beams which temporarily slow down their target.

Allows the user to create doors on any surface, allowing them to travel between locations instantaneously. It also grants the user the ability to turn themselves or others into doors, enabling them to pass through solid objects.
Allows the user to create and control soap-like bubbles at will. These bubbles can be used for various purposes, including trapping opponents and cleaning objects.
Allows the user to transform their body parts into a multitude of berry-like balls.
Allows the user to induce rust on any object they touch, causing it to deteriorate rapidly. This ability can be used for offense, defense, or sabotage.
Allows the user to transform their arms and feet into wheels.
Allows the user to conjure ghost.
Allows the user's soul to return to their body after death, granting them a second chance at life. It also makes the user effectively immortal and immune to most forms of physical damage.

Allows the user to manipulate shadows, including their own and those of others. This ability can be used for various purposes, including creating minions known as 'Zombies' and enhancing physical abilities.

Allows the user to repel anything they touch, including physical attacks, air, and even intangible concepts like pain or fatigue. This ability can also be used for teleportation and defensive purposes.
Allows the user to manipulate the ages of people or objects.
Allows the user to generate and manipulate magnetic forces at will. This ability can be used for various purposes, including attracting and repelling metallic objects and controlling projectiles.
Allows the user to create a spherical space within which they can manipulate objects freely. This ability can be used for various purposes, including surgery, teleportation, and defensive barriers.
Allows the user to transform into a fortress or castle, granting them immense defensive capabilities. This ability can also be used to house and protect others within the user's body.
Allows the user to create and manipulate straw at will, with the straw having damage-redirecting properties.
Allows the user to transform parts of their body into musical instruments and play music with a variety of destructive effects.
Allows the user to create pockets on their body.
Allows the user to literally 'wash and hang out to dry' people and objects as if they were clothes.
Allows the user to levitate themselves and other objects, essentially granting the power of flight. It also enables the user to manipulate gravity within a certain range.
Allows its user to drastically enlarge their body.

Allows the user to emit beams of pure love and lust from their body, turning anyone who sees them into stone if they harbor impure thoughts or desires towards the user. It also grants the user enhanced physical abilities.

Allows the user to generate and manipulate various deadly poisons from their body. It also grants the user immunity to all forms of poison and the ability to create and control substances with different properties.
Allows the user to create and control hormones in living beings, granting them the ability to manipulate emotions, physical conditions, and even genders.
Allows the user to transform their hands into scissors, granting them the ability to cut through virtually anything with ease. It also enhances the user's physical strength and dexterity.
Allows the user to transform their body into diamond, granting them immense physical strength and durability. It also enhances the user's resistance to physical and elemental attacks.
Allows the user to create vibrations, or 'quakes'
Allows the user to mark any object or person they touch with their hand. Once marked, the user can control the trajectory of objects and attacks towards the marked target, regardless of distance.
Allows the user to manipulate souls, including their own and those of others. This ability can be used for various purposes, including altering ages and absorbing lifespan.
Allows the user to create and manipulate clothing at will, including transforming themselves and others. This ability extends to the creation of weapons and defensive barriers made of cloth.
Allows the user to turn living beings and objects into toys by touching them. Those turned into toys lose their memories and identities, becoming completely subservient to the user's commands.
Allows the user to transform any part of their body into a weapon. This ability enables the user to produce and wield various weapons at will, making them a formidable combatant.
Allows the user to transform any part of their body or piece of worn clothing into propellers capable of rotation at high speed.
Allows the user to generate and manipulate a sticky substance similar to glue at will. This ability can be used for various purposes, including trapping opponents and creating defensive barriers.

Allows the user to manipulate gravitational forces at will. This ability enables the user to control the gravity of objects and people within a certain range, making them extremely powerful in combat.
Allows the user to create and manipulate barriers at will. These barriers are incredibly strong and can withstand powerful attacks, making the user effectively invulnerable.
Allows the user to create and manipulate threads at will. These threads are incredibly strong and can be used for various purposes, including sewing, binding, and attacking.

Allows the user to see through solid objects and read the minds of others. This ability grants the user incredible perception and insight, making them highly effective in espionage and reconnaissance.
Allows the user to turn any object they touch into a work of art. This ability extends to living beings as well, allowing the user to reshape and modify their appearance at will.

Allows the user to merge with clothing and other fabrics, effectively becoming a living suit of armor. This ability enhances the user's strength and durability, making them extremely formidable in combat.
Allows the user to cause their own body or any inorganic object they touch to rupture and explode.

Allows the user to swim through solid objects as if they were water. This ability grants the user incredible mobility and versatility, making them highly effective in infiltration and stealth missions.
Allows the user to increase their weight.
Allows the user to make their body and any object they touch become flat and flexible, letting solid objects ripple, billow, and flutter like a piece of cloth or a flag.
Allows the user to assimilate with and manipulate stone at will. This ability grants the user immense strength and durability, as well as the ability to reshape and control stone structures.

Allows the user to heal injuries and illnesses by shedding tears. This ability can also be used to restore objects to their original state and revive the dead, although doing so requires a great deal of energy.
Allows the user to create and control scrolls at will, which have special properties including storing objects and generating drawings.
Allows the user to create and manipulate mirrors at will. This ability can be used for various purposes, including transportation, communication, and creating illusions.
Allows the user to generate and manipulate candy at will. This ability extends to creating various constructs and weapons made of candy, as well as controlling existing candy.
Allows the user to generate and manipulate biscuits at will. This ability extends to creating various constructs and weapons made of biscuits, as well as controlling existing biscuits.
Allows the user to create and control butter.

Allows the user to create and manipulate books at will. This ability extends to controlling the contents of the books and using them for various purposes, including trapping opponents and storing objects.
Allows the user to create and manipulate cream.
Allows its user to drain liquid from both living and non-living things by wringing them, as well as absorb liquid into themselves and their weapons.
Allows the user to manipulate memories, including altering, erasing, and implanting memories in others. This ability grants the user incredible influence and control over individuals and situations.
Allows the user to generate and manipulate mochi at will. This ability extends to creating various constructs and weapons made of mochi, as well as controlling existing mochi.

Allows the user to summon and control a genie from their body. This genie can fulfill the user's wishes and carry out tasks on their behalf, making the user extremely powerful in combat and other situations.

Allows the user to generate and manipulate heat at will. This ability extends to creating intense heat waves, controlling fire, and raising temperatures to extreme levels, making the user extremely dangerous in combat.

Allows the user to manipulate and transform objects into food at will. This ability extends to creating and manipulating various types of dishes, as well as controlling the taste and properties of the food they create.
Allows the user to merge themselves with other people.
Allows the user to freely move and shape the ground as though it was malleable like clay.
Allows the user to spread the spirit of rebellion to others, inspiring them to fight for freedom and justice. This ability grants the user the ability to rally and empower their allies in battle.

Allows the user to tame and control animals by feeding them special dango made from their own body. This ability also grants the user the ability to communicate with and understand the thoughts of animals.
Allows the user to mature and decay anything they touch.
Allows the user to turn invisible at will, making them undetectable to the naked eye and most forms of detection. This ability grants the user incredible stealth and espionage capabilities.
Allows the user to afflict others with diseases.
Allows the user to teleport themselves and others from place to place.
Allows the user to transform into a giant, granting them immense size and strength. This transformation also enhances the user's durability and resilience to damage.
Grants the ability to merge with an island's environment and manipulate it.
Makes the user a Liquor Human.
Allows the user to use whips to command anything they hit.
Allows the user to control anything they ride.
Allows the user to create a soundproof field and to cancel all noises.
Allows the user to send themselves and others forward in time to a specific moment or era. This ability grants the user incredible control over time and the ability to manipulate events and outcomes.
Allows the user to generate ink from their body and use a painting brush to turn images created with that ink into three-dimensional, lifelike objects.
Allows the user's brain to expand indefinitely with new knowledge
